subsection_content:
Usually, patients have no symptoms or mild, vague symptoms if they only have a mild infection. But in some cases, severe infections, roundworm parasites attack the lungs and intestines, which is very dangerous.
In the lungs: ingested eggs reach the small intestine and release larvae. The larvae migrate through the bloodstream or lymphatic system into the lungs. Therefore, patients may experience signs and symptoms similar to asthma or pneumonia such as: persistent cough, difficulty breathing, shortness of breath, wheezing...; fatigue, weight loss, abdominal pain, stomach pain, nausea, diarrhea, bloody stools, worms in stools, intestinal obstruction, malnutrition.
subsection_title: benh giun dua.json. Symptoms of roundworm disease
subsection_data:
benh giun dua.json. Symptoms of roundworm disease
Usually, patients have no symptoms or mild, vague symptoms if they only have a mild infection. But in some cases, severe infections, roundworm parasites attack the lungs and intestines, which is very dangerous.
In the lungs: ingested eggs reach the small intestine and release larvae. The larvae migrate through the bloodstream or lymphatic system into the lungs. Therefore, patients may experience signs and symptoms similar to asthma or pneumonia such as: persistent cough, difficulty breathing, shortness of breath, wheezing...; fatigue, weight loss, abdominal pain, stomach pain, nausea, diarrhea, bloody stools, worms in stools, intestinal obstruction, malnutrition.
